title: India needs more time for transition from coal: Experts
description: The UK has closed its last coal power plant, becoming the first G7 nation to do so. Experts say coal will remain part of India's energy mix for decades due to its significant energy needs. India emphasizes that developed countries should lead in reducing emissions while it transitions to cleaner energy sources.
